jp_text: もうランチが待ち遠しいの？

en_text: It appears that Japanese astronauts are better with their hands.
jp_text: 日本人というのは やはり➡

en_text: And it's been years since they've seen anyone with your instincts.
jp_text: そして ここ数年で間違いなく➡
google_translated: And definitely in the last few years ➡

en_text: We want you to put those skills to use...

google_translated: I want you to use ISS.

en_text: Staying behind to practice on the robotic arm paid off!
jp_text: いつも ひとり残って➡
もうお店 予約してあるから｡
google_translated: Because there is already a shop reservation.

jp_text: 各自 メールを見てくれ｡

en_text: Each team will be asked to construct a 1/3 scale model of Moonbase and the surrounding facilities.
jp_text: それぞれ ３分の１スケールの

en_text: On each team, the two rookies will come up with ideas for the surrounding facilities.
google_translated: Two newcomers of each team are ➡

en_text: We will let each team determine who is assigned to the design and construction phases.
jp_text: 役割分担等については➡

en_text: Make sure you show off your skills.
jp_text: しっかりアピールするんだな｡
よし 決定｡で 次…｡

en_text: But is it worth the effort?
jp_text: この手順を踏むかどうか｡
google_translated: Whether to step on this procedure.

en_text: It'll be the Apollo era all over again.
Oh, I like the sound of that.
I'd be interested in charging stations for Beetle and the rover.
jp_text: ローバーとかビートルのさ➡
そうだね 一刻を争うって時に
google_translated: That's right, when I fight for a moment

en_text: we can't wait for a vehicle to return to base for recharging.
jp_text: 長くて待ってられないよね｡
google_translated: You can not wait for a long time.

en_text: Our proposal is to construct the telescope there.
jp_text: 月で望遠鏡を作ってしまう⦆
google_translated: I will make a telescope in the moon

en_text: I like it... I think it's a great idea!
jp_text: いいね すごくいいと思うよ｡
google_translated: I think it is very good.

en_text: We can build the telescope together.
jp_text: 一緒にやろうぜ 望遠鏡も｡

en_text: Are you going to the moon?
jp_text: パパ 月 行くの？

en_text: Your daddy's going to the moon.
jp_text: ウチのパパが月に行くなんて｡
google_translated: Uchi's dad goes to the moon.

en_text: I spent five days in France for an international conference.
He isn't answering. He must be training...
Where are you? Where are you?

jp_text: はぁ～疲れた 頭痛い…｡

en_text: Wow, sounds like it's been rough.
google_translated: [Keitai] It was a lot of trouble.

jp_text: そ そんなこと言うなよ｡

en_text: "Do your best" is a phrase I always have to stop myself from saying.
They've had to leave their native country,
jp_text: 慣れ親しんだ日本を離れ➡

google_translated: I wonder if I can not help it ....

en_text: I have to do my part.

ど どういうことですか？
